text: The Cadillac XT4 is a subcompact Luxury Crossover SUV made by General Motors under Cadillac since 2018. == History and Features == The Cadillac XT4 was first teased by Cadillac during a telecast of the 90th academy awards in March 2018."Cadillac offers a peek at new KCK-made XT4 during Oscars broadcast", Kansas City Business Journal (March 5, 2018) later it was launched in at the New York Auto Show in the same month."Cadillac XT4 Will Debut at 2018 New York Auto Show", GM Authority (January 17, 2018) while pre-orders started shortly after its debut."2019 Cadillac XT4 debuts with turbo power, $35,790 price tag", MSN/CNET (March 27, 2018) The name means "Crossover Touring 4" and its the second Crossover SUV from the brand being positioned below the Cadillac XT5 and being a luxury equivalent to the Chevrolet Equinox and the GMC Terrain and its one of Cadillac's models of the XT (Crossover Touring) series."Cadillac XT6 caught Testing for the First Time" from Cadillac Society (April 18, 2018) It has a 2.0 liter turbo gasoline engine and a 2.0 liter diesel engine (availiable in Europe only) all with a 9-speed automatic transmission it was improved in 2023 as a 2024 model. == Markets == The Cadillac XT5 is sold mainly in The North American market but also in China and Europe (where its imported) it was also sold in South Korea. == End of the USA production == The Cadillac XT4 is planned to be discontinued in North America in 2025 without a sucessor however it will still be sold in China. == References == XT4 Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Cadillac XT4
